summary: "The Dudesons Movie" is an extreme stunts comedy that features the wild antics of four hilarious, lifelong friends and their crazy lives in the Arctic Circle.
cast: Jarno Leppälä|Jukka Hilden|Jarno Laasala|Hannu-Pekka Parviainen|Bam Margera|Steve-O|April Margera|Phil Margera|Vincent Margera|Rakeyohn|Chris Raab|Rita Faltoyano|Aneta and Bela|Ryan Dunn|'Mad' Mike Jones|Bloodhound Gang|Jimmy Pop|Jared 'Evil' Hasselhoff|Elena Gibson|Kirke Gardener|Lamourettes|Tarja Karvonen|Jussi Seljas|Busty Wolter|Oystein Kjorstad|Exodus|Ryan Simonetti|Tatu Heikkinen|Teemu Heikkinen|Teppo Heikkinen|Jussi Ranta|Lassi Lindqvist|Aki Niininen
title: The Dudesons Movie
